report.title: Loving Kindness
report.author: The Odeol
report.bodytext: After 15 minutes of loving meditation /n I inhaled nitrous /n The patterns behind my eyelids formed sublime /n The term mountainous love repeated /n A glimpse of pure love /n We wear the world like clothes /n Must be spiritual nudists /n (buddhists) /n Falling over in conversations /n over words /n (sublime)
